scripts.check: sh -c 'if [ -f ../../console/.env ]; then if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file ../../console/.env --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/print-e2e-checklist.ts; else node --env-file ../../console/.env --import tsx src/scripts/print-e2e-checklist.ts; fi; else if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/print-e2e-checklist.ts; else node --import tsx src/scripts/print-e2e-checklist.ts; fi; fi'
scripts.build-package: sh -c 'if [ -f ../../console/.env ]; then if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file ../../console/.env --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/build-app-package.ts; else node --env-file ../../console/.env --import tsx src/scripts/build-app-package.ts; fi; else if [ -f .env.teams-package ]; then node --env-file .env.teams-package --import tsx src/scripts/build-app-package.ts; else node --import tsx src/scripts/build-app-package.ts; fi; fi'
scripts.zip-package: cd appPackage && zip -r ../haveri-teams-app.zip manifest.json color.png outline.png
